Liushutong characters (4)

亹字的基本解释

亹
wěi
〔亹亹〕ａ．缓慢流动，无止无休，如“清流亹亹。”ｂ．形容孜孜不倦。

亹
mén
山峡中两岸相对如门之处：“凫鹭在亹”。

亹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》無匪切，上尾，微。］
亦作“斖1”。
(1)勤勉不倦。参见“亹亹”。
(2)美。
(3)进入。
(4)修养。
[②]［mén］
［《廣韻》莫奔切，平魂，明。］
(1)峡中两岸对峙如门的地方。
(2)指门。
[③]［xìn］
同“舋1”。
(1)徵兆。
(2)罪过。

亹字的康熙字典解释

【子集上】【亠字部】　亹； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页90第01
【廣韻】【正韻】無匪切【集韻】【韻會】武斐切，?音尾。亹亹，不倦意。【易·繫辭】成天下之亹亹。　又强勉也。【詩·大雅】亹亹文王，令聞不已。又【禮·禮器】天時雨澤，君子達亹亹焉。　又【集韻】【正韻】?謨奔切，音門。【詩·大雅】鳧鷖在亹。【註】水流峽中，兩岸對出若門也。　又地名。【前漢·地理志】金城浩亹縣。【註】在臨洮府金州縣，以浩亹水得名。　【正字通】徐鉉曰：說文無亹，當作娓。崔靈恩改易詩亹作娓，周伯琦亦从娓廢亹，皆臆說，不足信。

亹字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
亹字的起名意思

本意指水流夹山处，也有勤勉不倦，美妙，美好之义。

I
Basic explanation of words
I
wěi
[亹亹] a. It flows slowly, endlessly, such as "clear flow I." b. Describe tirelessness.
I
mén
The two sides of the mountain gorge are relatively like doors: "The mallard is here."
I
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" no bandit cut, upper tail, micro. ]
Also known as "斖1".
(1) Diligence and tirelessness. See "I".
(2) Beauty.
(3) Enter.
(4) Self-cultivation.
[②]［mén］
["Guangyun" Mo Benqie, Ping Hun, Ming. ]
(1) A place where the two sides of the gorge face each other like a door.
(2) Refers to the door.
[③]［xìn］
Same as "舋1".
(1) Signs.
(2) Sin.
I
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset Part 1] [Department of Words] 　亹; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 90 01
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Cut without Bandit [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Wu Fei cut, the sound ending. I am tireless. 【Yi·Xi Ci】It has become the best in the world.　 It's also forced. [Poetry·Daya] I am the king of literary works, so I can hear it endlessly. Also 【Ritual·Ritual Vessel】When the weather is raining, the gentleman reaches Qi Yan.　[Jiyun] [Zhengyun]? Mo Benqie, sound gate. 【Poetry·Daya】The mallard is here. [Note] In the water flow gorge, there is a door on both sides of the bank.　Also place name. [Former Han Geography] Haoquan County, Jincheng. [Note] In Jinzhou County, Lintao Prefecture, it is named after Haoqishui.　【Zhengzitong】Xu Xuan said: If you say that there is nothing in the text, treat it as a 娓. Cui Lingen changed his poems, and Zhou Boqi also abolished them.

Name meaning
The original meaning refers to the place where the water flows and the mountain, but also has the meaning of diligence, beauty, and beauty.
mén, wěi
сущ.
1) mén ущелье, теснина
2) wěi узор
